text: Dangi nei, gei mee guu hana guu hai dana tigidaumaha gi nia kau daane e logo, nia siibi mono damaa kau daane pedi. Mee gu gahi au dama daane huogodoo, mo Joab di tagi o au gau dauwa, mo Abiathar tangada hai mee dabu, gei digaula e madalia a mee e hai di nadau hagamiami dolomeenei mo di wwolowwolo boloo, ‘Di king Adonijah gi mouli waalooloo!’
